wikipedia_page.main: William Alexander McArthur (1857 – 7 June 1923), was a British Liberal politician and businessman.

response: *William McArthur (Lord Mayor of London) (1809–1887), Irish businessman, MP and Lord Mayor of London

After starting business with a consignment from his brother William McArthur, he became a partner of William Little and James H. Atkinson. He was a devout Methodist and in 1843 he was elected to the committee of the Wesleyan Auxiliary Missionary Society of New South Wales. He was also treasurer of the Young Men's Christian Association of Sydney and a committee member of the Benevolent Asylum, the New South Wales Auxiliary Bible Society and other charities.
